Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Seat Planner application

A React + TypeScript web application for teachers to create classroom
seating plans with constraint-based optimization.

Features:
- CSV import for student lists \(name, gender\)
- Two-panel UI with student list and classroom grid
- Pair constraints: ban or prefer students sitting together
- Row preferences: front or back row placement
- Gender mode: same or different gender pairing
- Drag-and-drop manual placement
- Save/load plans as JSON
- PDF export with full details

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

EOF
\)")
